amendment.description: Amendment prohibits EPA from using any funds to allow the importation of PCB waste for incineration in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 as printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit EPA from using funds to implement a ruling regarding the importation into the U.S. of PCB's which are used in insulation and electrical equipment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bentsen amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
